metadata.title: DPM Dar congratulates Marco Rubio on confirmation as US Secretary of State

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 21 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Tuesday felicitated Marxo Rubio on unanimous confirmation by the United States Senate for appointment as the Secretary of State. "Pakistan looks forward to working closely with you (Marco Rubio) towards strengthening bilateral ties and promoting peace, stability and prosperity in the regional as well as in the global context," the deputy prime miniater said in a post on social media platform X.
